short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a new tab in VirusTotal with a domain, IP address, or file hash

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool has been designed to improve productivity while browsing cybersecurity reports or working with web security tool portals. Focusing on efficiency, this tool streamlines your workflow by simplifying searches to VirusTotal.

Upon activation, the extension operates seamlessly: when you select a domain, an IP, or file hashes (MD5, SHA1, SHA256), it automatically opens a new browser tab with the search preloaded on VirusTotal. This feature expedites information retrieval and analysis within VirusTotal, ultimately saving you time and effort.

The functionality is user-friendly, allowing for easy toggling on and off by simply clicking the extension icon and using the switch. Beyond domains and IPs, the extension also recognizes various formats such as 'domain[.]com', '127.0.0[.]1', and '127[.]0.0.1', expanding its versatility and usability.
